Name: EQUITO APP S.L
Description: A real estate investment platform enabling users to invest in fractional properties starting from €100. The platform facilitates seamless investment management and offers passive monthly income through property tokenization and fractional ownership.

Name: VORA
Description: Vora is inspired by the city of Barcelona, promoting serenity through unique sensory experiences.

Name: SEEDFY ECOSYSTEM S.L.
Description: LexDoka is a collaborative platform that turns the creation, review, negotiation, signing, and management of contracts into an easy, agile, and efficient task for any company or individual, with or without legal knowledge.

Name: KOKUAI S.L.
Description: Kokuai is a Barcelona based start-up founded in 2020  aiming to improve the efficiency of healthcare providers processes, enabling them to deliver a better service experience to their patients. By using our  AI conversational platform, healthcare facilities can connect and engage with patients on WhatsAp, optimizing their scheduling process for maximum conversion and reducing cancellations and no-shows.

Name: FLAMAID S.L.
Description: Flamaid is a safety device equipped with an audible alarm and GPS technology, designed for emergency situations.
Address: Calle Salvador Espriu, 47 P. 5 Pta. 1 08005 Barcelona

Description: We empower Generation Z and help companies create an inclusive organizational culture that attracts young talent.

Name: DIPNEO S.L
Description: Dipneo is developing a medical device for auxiliary resuscitation in patients with cardiorespiratory arrest, based on a patented technology from Eurecat.
Address: Plaza Pau Vila (Ed. Palau De Mar), 1 P. 2, Sector 2 C 08039 Barcelona

Name: TIRECAT HEALTH SL
Description:
We develop and manufacture a novel family of polymers with great properties for different fields of medicine from tissue regeneration to oncology we are able to tackle a wide spread of medical needs.
PyroH our first clinical candidate is a polymer that adheres to wet tissues acting as an implant that speeds up regeneration times up to 41% and is able to completely guarantee infection prevention. This properties position it as a unique value proposition in the realm of skin regeneration.
Address: Rbla Catalunya Num 78 Planta 3 Puerta 1B 08008 B 08008 Barcelona
Technologies:
Medical devices, 
		                		
		                			Biotechnology, 
		                		
		                			NBS (Nature Based Solutions)
Spinoff participants:
CERCA Centre (CERCA Centre); 
CSIC Centre (CSIC Centre)

Name: CRIBDATA, S.L.
Description: Cribdata is transforming personal data processing, offering enhanced security and efficiency for handling sensitive information.

Name: THE BALANCE PHONE SL
Description: We offer an addiction-free phone.  The Balance Phone offers the connectivity needed to live nowadays without any addictive and distracting apps and websites.  Our product gives access to tools and services such as Messaging, Music, Digital banking, Mobility and Health while blocking all Social media, Streaming services, Games, News, Betting apps and Pornography websites.

Name: VIVAGRAN
Description: Vivagran is a consumer-driven cereal-based biotechnology company focused on developing and commercializing high-value branded cereals.  We do breeding produce seed/grains and grant licenses for the commercial exploitation of our proprietary crops.
